parameters.description: The Media Services account name.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

displayName.description: The display name for the dimension.

toBeExportedForShoebox.description: Whether to export metric to shoebox.

values.description: The count of a number of items, usually requests.
The count of a number of items, usually requests.

displayName.description: The diagnostic log category display name.

blobDuration.description: The time range for requests in each blob.

LogSpecification.description: A diagnostic log emitted by service.

nameAvailable.description: Specifies if the name is available.

reason.description: Specifies the reason if the name is not available.

message.description: Specifies the detailed reason if the name is not available.

EntityNameAvailabilityCheckOutput.description: The response from the check name availability request.

id.description: The ID of the storage account resource. Media Services relies on tables and queues as well as blobs, so the primary storage account must be a Standard Storage account (either Microsoft.ClassicStorage or Microsoft.Storage). Blob only storage accounts can be added as secondary storage accounts.

type.description: The type of the storage account.

values.description: The primary storage account for the Media Services account.
A secondary storage account for the Media Services account.

id.description: The ID of the storage account resource.

SyncStorageKeysInput.description: The input to the sync storage keys request.

storageAccounts.description: The storage accounts for this resource.

MediaServiceProperties.description: Properties of the Media Services account.

deviceId.description: Unique identifier of the edge device.

name.description: Name of the Event Hub where usage will be reported.

namespace.description: Namespace of the Event Hub where usage will be reported.

token.description: SAS token needed to interact with Event Hub.

dataCollectionFrequency.description: Usage data collection frequency in ISO 8601 duration format e.g. PT10M , PT5H.

dataReportingFrequency.description: Usage data reporting frequency in ISO 8601 duration format e.g. PT10M , PT5H.

maxAllowedUnreportedUsageDuration.description: Maximum time for which the functionality of the device will not be hampered for not reporting the usage data.

principalId.description: The Principal ID of the identity.

tenantId.description: The Tenant ID of the identity.

keyIdentifier.description: The URL of the Key Vault key used to encrypt the account. The key may either be versioned (for example https://vault/keys/mykey/version1) or reference a key without a version (for example https://vault/keys/mykey).

currentKeyIdentifier.description: The current key used to encrypt the Media Services account, including the key version.

type.description: The type of key used to encrypt the Account Key.

values.description: The Account Key is encrypted with a System Key.
The Account Key is encrypted with a Customer Key.

@odata.nextLink.description: A link to the next page of the collection (when the collection contains too many results to return in one response).
A link to the next page of the collection (when the collection contains too many results to return in one response).

type.description: The account type. For a Media Services account, this should be 'MediaServices'.

CheckNameAvailabilityInput.description: The input to the check name availability request.

ApiVersion.name: api-version
ApiVersion.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.
